tool_description: Analyzes customer's return history and patterns to assess risk factors and inform return processing decisions.

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to look back for analysis

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer ID must be a valid registered customer.
Invalid analysis_period_days: Period must be a positive integer not exceeding 3650 days.
Customer data unavailable: Unable to retrieve customer history data.
usage: Use early in return process to identify high-risk customers or patterns that may require additional scrutiny.

total_returns.description: Total number of returns in analysis period

return_rate_percent.description: Percentage of purchases that were returned

risk_score.description: Customer risk score from 0-100 (higher = more risk)

recommended_action.description: Recommended processing approach: standard, enhanced_review, manager_approval
